A JSON object containing info about the backtest and its new name or note. The /backtests/update API accepts requests in the following format:

UpdateBacktestRequest Model - Request to update a backtest's name or note.
projectId integer
required
Id of the project that contains the backtest.
backtestId string
required
Id of the backtest to update.
name string
Name to assign to the backtest.
note string
Note to attach to the backtest.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 0,
  "backtestId": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "note": "string"
}
